item.title: Interactively-Mapping-Spatial-Prediction-With-the-Attached-Standard-Error-Using-Mlr-Gstat-and-Leaflet
item.description: Here we demonstrate how to map the prediction together with the uncertainty in an intuitive and intelligible way. Our approach is based on this post by Tomislav Hengl and this post by Penn state college of earth and mineral sciences # For the example, using the output of mlr gstat KED from previous section # loading datasets data(meuse) data(meuse.grid) # imputing values to missing data meuse = impute(meuse, classes = list(numeric = imputeMean(), factor = imputeMode()), dummy.
